# Marchant Ward

| area =
| class =
| upper =
| lifespan =
| coordinates =
}}
The Marchant Ward is a Brisbane City Council ward covering Alderley, Aspley, Chermside, Chermside West, Geebung, Gordon Park, Grange, Kedron, Lutwyche, Stafford, Stafford Heights and Windsor.
